column5: Anybody have experience on Central Lake with Big hook outfitters? Also have an option at Sheartone with Amik, any input on wither lake would be much appreciate! Looking at mid august trip. Thanks!

This depends on what you want. Went with Big Hook in 21 to Burnt Lake. Ryan does a great job. However Central will have other guests and not by yourselves, but good fishery. We went with Amik last summer to Cobham Morley outpost. Very good outfitter and all their lake outposts are good. Shearstone is a true outpost and you would be on your own, with no other camps. My brothers and I are returning to Amik in 23 late July to Vee Lake.

Thanks, Shearstone was open several dates so i wondered if there was reason, Vee is open also the week we want to go. I need to decide soon which one, there isnt much on the internet about fishing shearstone, pressure to get it right lol
I would absolutly go to Vee. Usually booked .PM if you you want to chat more.
Try them both,that will settle things.No need to make up your mind.
